upcoming.title: Cafe Cursor Boston
upcoming.subtitle: Boston's First Cursor Community Gathering
upcoming.description: Join us for the first Cursor community event in Boston. Featuring co-working, Cursor workshops for entrepreneurs, engineers, and non-technical folks. Meet the community, learn something new, and grab some coffee.
upcoming.longDescription:
Cafe Cursor Boston is an intimate gathering designed to bring together developers, entrepreneurs, and curious minds who want to explore the future of AI-powered development.

Whether you're a seasoned engineer looking to supercharge your workflow, an entrepreneur wanting to build faster, or someone who's never written a line of code but is curious about what's possible â€” this event is for you.

We'll have hands-on workshops, open co-working time, and plenty of opportunities to connect with fellow community members over great coffee.

agenda.title: Doors Open & Coffee
agenda.description: Grab some coffee, settle in, and meet fellow attendees

agenda.title: Welcome & Introductions
agenda.description: Brief overview of the day and community introductions

agenda.title: Workshop Sessions
agenda.description: Hands-on workshops tailored to different skill levels

agenda.title: Open Co-working
agenda.description: Work on your projects with community support

agenda.title: Networking & Close
agenda.description: Wrap up and connect with new friends

faq.question: Do I need coding experience?
faq.answer: Not at all! We have workshops designed specifically for non-technical folks. Cursor makes it possible to build without writing code yourself.

faq.question: What should I bring?
faq.answer: Bring your laptop with Cursor installed (we can help you set it up if needed). We'll provide coffee, snacks, and good vibes.

faq.question: Is there parking available?
faq.answer: Details about parking and public transit will be shared closer to the event date.

faq.question: Can I come for just part of the event?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Feel free to drop in and out as your schedule allows.

coworkingInfo.description: Reserve your spot at one of our 2-hour coworking sessions. Work on your projects alongside fellow developers with access to mentors and community support.
